content: granny square bucket hat materials h8/5 00mm hook worsted weight size 4 yarn mc blue - approx 87 yds cc1 white - approx 21 yds cc2 red - approx 31 yds yarn needle gauge after round 4 granny square should measure about 4 25 hat is made of 5 basic granny squares sewn into a circle topped with another granny square and then the brim is added it is one-size-fits-many with a finished circumference of approximately 22 directions crown- make 5 granny squares round 1- with mc all in magic_ring chain 3 counts as a stitch here and throughout 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 times slip_stitch to beg chain 3 fasten_off 12 double_crochet 4 chain-2 space round 2- join cc1 in any corner chain-2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same chain-2 space to make corner * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * twice more join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten off 24 double_crochet 4 chain-2 space round 3- join cc2 in any corner chain-2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same chain-2 space *skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * twice more skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten_off 36 double_crochet 4 chain-2 space round 4- join mc in any corner chain-2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same chain-2 space * skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space twice 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain-2 space repeat from * twice more skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next space twice join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten_off leaving a 12 tail for sewing 48 double_crochet 4 chain-2 space stitch the 5 squares together into a long strip then stitch the short ends together to form a circle with the right side facing out weave in ends top of hat- make 1 granny square repeat rounds 1-4 of granny square do not fasten_off round 5- chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-2 corner space *double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-2 corner space repeat from * twice more double_crochet in last 9 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of chain-3 do not fasten_off 60 double_crochet now attach the top of the hat to the crown by holding the wrong sides together and working a round of single_crochet through both layers this round will be on the outside of the hat at the top chain 1 insert hook into same space as join on the top of the hat and then into any double_crochet on the crown yo and pull loop through both layers yo and pull thru both loops on hook 1 single_crochet completed continue around only working into the double_crochet stitches of the crown skipping
